page.title: 20James Roach John / dogs
page.content: My name is{James Roach John.}I live in Crowhill House,Haverfordwest, which was built over 100 years ago. Scolton is the name of the field next door because the huntsmen from Scolton Manor would leave their horses there to graze in the summer months. First thing on a Saturday morning I get up and go with my father to feed and let out the dogs. We have {21 {Labradors, 7 English Springers}and{2 {Cocker Spaniels}(we also have{2 Cocker {puppies).}Next we clean and hose out their kennels. We take{one dog at a time}into a nearby field for TRAINING...my father throws a{green canvas bag}as a dummy; he fires his{starting pistol}and then {]]] SENDS THE DOG AFTER THE DUMMY [[[ These training sessions help us when we go on{'Shoots'}& even to win money at the{Pembrokeshire Gun-dog Trials.
